name: Aaron Heaton
description: As the founding attorney at Heaton & Associates, Aaron placed an early emphasis on empowering clients through education. To that end, Aaron insists on being deeply involved in the details of each case in order to more effectively communicate with his clients. This approach invites clients to take part in critical decisions, granting them ownership of their claims and continual insight into the claims process. Aaron believes collaboration and respect open more doors than conflict, a philosophy that has earned him strong relationships nationwide. His reputation translates to credibility among his peers, and better outcomes for his clients, whether through negotiation or trial. Both in and out of court, Aaron has successfully resolved catastrophic injury claims involving amputations, spinal reconstruction, and traumatic brain injuries, while also applying the same attention and expertise to those with less severe injuries. Outside the office, Aaron is an engaged husband and father of four. He enjoys youth sports, chess, NBA basketball, and exploring national parks with his family.
